title: Orc Voice Pack
description: Attention, warriors of the land! Feast your ears upon a powerful audio pack forged to infuse your epic quests with thunderous orcish chants echoing across the battlefield.
longDescription:
Elevate Your RPG or RTS Adventure!


https://youtu.be/yy4FMRFfZ0Y?si=d64xhDFSfYOOOJyH


🕹️ Immerse Players: Dive deep into the fantastical realms of epic quests and strategic battles with this comprehensive audio pack designed to immerse players in captivating adventures.


🌟 High-Quality Audio: Delve into a world of immersive storytelling with meticulously crafted phrases that bring the ambience of mystical adventures to life.


🧌 Orc Voice: Experience the raw power and rugged charm of the orcish voice, capable of conveying strength, mystery, and primal energy.


🔧 Versatile Usage: Tailored for a variety of gaming experiences, whether it's embarking on heroic quests, engaging in fierce battles, or strategizing in real-time strategy games.


🔊 Announcements: 10 commanding announcements, including battle cries and rallying calls, to inspire and motivate players on their journey. “Tonight we feast on victory!”


🗣️ Boasts: Dominate your enemies with 10 intimidating boasts, promising to crush their bones and drink from their skulls after the battle


💬 Idle Chats: Experience the camaraderie of the orc camp with 10 immersive idle chats! From longing for the thrill of battle to sharing dreams of conquest, these phrases bring the orcish world to life


⚔️ Killed: Feel the agony of defeat with 10 phrases expressing the pain of being slain in battle. Let your players experience the raw emotion of defeat in the orcish tongue


😢 Wounded: Ten gut-wrenching cries of pain to add realism to your battles. Let your players feel the agony of combat as they fight on despite their wounds.


🚶‍♂️ Moving: Acknowledge commands with 10 phrases for movement orders. Lead your troops into battle with confidence and authority


📢 Awaiting Orders: Notify your commander with 10 announcements signalling the need for orders. Keep the battlefield under control with clear communication.


👏 Well Done: Celebrate victories with 10 hearty congratulatory phrases. Let your players revel in their successes as they bask in the glory of battle.


🎉 Mission Accomplished: Announce triumph with 10 resounding declarations of success. Inspire your players as they achieve their objectives and claim victory.


👋 Welcome: Greet your players with 10 warm and inviting welcome messages. Set the tone for epic adventures in the world of orcs and warriors.


👍👎 Yes / No: 20 different Orcish ways for replying yes or no when given commands.


🛖 Orc-themed Buildings: 30 different Orc-themed buildings with announcements for each one being completed, attacked, and destroyed.


🎮 Discord Support: Active Discord channel for feedback and requests. Need a specific phrase or word? Write it in the chat and I'll include it in the next update! https://discord.gg/DSUd2QcyHZ


The Orc Voice Pack unlocks the untamed essence of orcish adventures, enriching your gaming world with the spirit of conquest and glory!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Number of Audio Waves: 225
  •  Sample rate/bit rate: 44,100 Hz
  •  Non-looping
  • Minutes of audio provided: 7:37


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: PDF file included
